text: Donald G. Malarkey (July 31, 1921 - September 30, 2017)Malarkey, p. 12. was a former non-commissioned officer during World War II. Malarkey was portrayed in the HBO miniseries Band of Brothers by Scott Grimes. Malarkey was born in Astoria, Oregon on July 31, 1921. ==References== ==Other websites== *Photos of Don Malarkey & the Band of Brothers during their visit to the 1st Armored Division in Germany *Photos of Don Malarkey during his 2009 visit with Prince Charles *Interview from Men of Easy Company Category:1921 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Military people from Oregon Category:Purple Heart recipients
